doc.title: Stag: Engaged & Exposed
doc.plot: Before they tie the knot, these bachelors have one last night to fulfill their deepest desires on STAG, the only reality show that brings you the wildest bachelor parties. Too hot for TV is BACK with STAG: Engaged & Exposed. Watch these bachelors satisfy every last desire and pay the price when their fianc√©es watch the footage the very next day.
